entry.title: Newsletter #102
entry.content:
Guess what? It’s TechThursday again!

Devour this awesome list of links during the upcoming weekend folks!

  • Testing in GO

  • Designing APIs for Asynchrony

  • JAWS: The Javascript + AWS Stack

  • codedoodl.es: a showcase of curated creative coding sketches

  • Flux architecture on android

  • A brief history of scaling linkedin

  • A collection of useful stream utility modules

  • A ssh server that knows who you are. $ ssh whoami.filippo.io

  • A visual introduction to machine learning

  • Add instant search to your blog or documentation using our jekyll plugin

  • An introduction to bdd from konstantin kudryashov

  • Bringing the python data stack to the shell prompt

  • Centralized docker container logging with native graylog integration | open source log management with graylog

  • Data science blogs

  • Docker is coming whether you like it or not | kyle baley

  • Don’t test with sqllite when you use postgres in production

  • Exploring es2016 decorators

  • Facebook: our drones will use lasers to deliver 10gbps internet access

  • Get ready for the future — javascript scene — medium

  • Gophercon 2015 roundup – the go blog

  • Healthchecks.io – get notified when your cron jobs fail

  • How an enterprise begins its big data journey

  • How i am maintaining multiple emails for git on a same machine

  • How i “hacked” the oneplus reservation system. — medium

  • How marketplace search differs from traditional search

  • Introducing nurse: auto-remediation at linkedin

  • Is your team ready for devops?

  • Json-ld – json for linking data

  • Macgapproject/macgap1

  • Mobile number login

  • Mycli: a mysql client with auto-completion and syntax highlighting

  • New in symfony 2.8: redesigned web debug toolbar (symfony blog)

  • Non-blocking asynchronous json.parse using the fetch api

  • React-dragula: drag and drop so simple it hurts

  • Scaling the datagram team – instagram engineering

  • Speeding up database calls with pdo and iterators

  • Starting now at netflix: unlimited maternity and paternity leave

  • Stopping docker containers gracefully – techbar

  • Terminology – why are good programmers referred to as ninjas? – programmers stack exchange

  • Testinfra test your infrastructure

  • The magic tricks of testing by sandi metz

  • The secret of devops: it’s always been about people, not technology

  • Who is the boss in da house? frontend vs backend vs fullstack

  • Why prediction is / is not part of statistics
